metadata.title: CVE-2024-36946 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:phonet: fix rtm_phonet_notify() skb allocationfill_route() stores three components in the skb:- struct rtmsg- RTA_DST (u8)- RTA_OIF (u32)Therefore, rtm_phonet_notify() should useNLMSG_ALIGN(sizeof(struct rtmsg)) +nla_total_size(1) +nla_total_size(4)

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication.
linux-aws package in noble is affected and needs fixing.
linux-azure package in noble is affected and needs fixing.

linux-intel package in noble is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication.
